title: Using the Minimum Proxy to Implement an ERC20 Coin Minting Factory
creator: 0xD6823f807C45eFDC56c9aE8Db0226CA10af6E8AB

questions.title:
Simulate the minting of ERC20 tokens with inscriptions on Ethereum, and write a factory contract that can create ERC20 through the minimum proxy. The factory contract contains two methods:

• `deployInscription(string name, string symbol, uint totalSupply, uint perMint)`, which users call to create an ERC20 contract

• `mintInscription(address tokenAddr)`: Issues the `perMint` quantity of tokens determined at the time of creation each time it is called. 

Please reply with code or a code repository link.

description: Understand how the minimum proxy saves gas, use the minimum proxy to implement a coin minting factory for the 'fair' issuance of ERC20 tokens.
